categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order

nodes.text:
Saylind Donels was a human male youngling in the years around the Clone Wars.
He trained in the Bear Clan under the guidance of Yoda. When Obi-Wan Kenobi was searching for Kamino location and he came to Yoda's classroom, Donels was there for his lightsaber training.
